function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of centralized database for coronavirus research","Impact":"Increased risk of unauthorized access to sensitive data","Mitigation":"Implement strong encryption and access control measures","Technologies":"Encryption, access control systems","People":"Research center, database software organizations","Owner":"Research center, database software organizations"},{"Description":"Use of location and proximity data for contact tracing","Impact":"Privacy concerns and potential misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Ensure strict compliance with data protection regulations and anonymize personal data","Technologies":"Anonymization techniques, data protection regulations","People":"Government of Singapore, app users","Owner":"Government of Singapore, app developers"},{"Description":"Use of cellphone location data for contact tracing","Impact":"Privacy concerns and potential misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to data protection regulations and transparency in data usage","Technologies":"Data protection regulations, transparency measures","People":"Government of South Korea, general public","Owner":"Government of South Korea, relevant authorities"}]}
